thread.title: BRIEF-Bloober Team Q1 Net Profit Up At 0.7 Million Zlotys

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bloober Team Q1 Net Profit Up At 0.7 Million Zlotys
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - BLOOBER TEAM SA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY THAT ITS Q1 NET PROFIT WAS 0.7 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS 0.6 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
* Q1 REVENUE WAS 4.6 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS 3.4 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
